thread.title_full: 'Refugees welcome' banner unfurled at Statue of Liberty in apparent anti-Trump protest - U.S. News - Haaretz.com

author: The Associated Press
title: 'Refugees welcome' banner unfurled at Statue of Liberty in apparent anti-Trump protest - U.S. News - Haaretz.com
text: Trumpâ€™s inspiration for 'last night in Sweden' filmed himself throwing stones at Palestinians The National Park Service is trying to figure out who unfurled a giant banner at the Statue of Liberty saying "Refugees Welcome." Park Service spokesman Jerry Willis says the 3-by-20-foot banner was hung from the public observation deck at the top of the statue's pedestal Tuesday afternoon. The banner was taken down more than an hour later. Willis says regulations prohibit anything fixed to the statue. skip - Liberty
